content.text: We decided at work to migrate from PostgreSQL to CockroachDB for our main database. The team voted 7-2 in favor. The migration starts next quarter. We're also switching from Jest to Vitest for our test framework.

Big decisions! PostgreSQL to CockroachDB migration kicking off next quarter with strong team support (7-2). And Jest to Vitest for testing - good move, Vitest is significantly faster with ESM projects. I'll remember both of these.
I prefer using pnpm over npm or yarn. Always use pnpm for my projects. Also I hate tabs - spaces only, 2-space indent. And I use VS Code, not vim or emacs.
Preferences locked in: pnpm always, 2-space indentation (no tabs), VS Code as your editor. Clean and consistent.
